informations.Title: Dil Bechara
informations.Actors: Sushant Singh Rajput, Sanjana Sanghi, Sahil Vaid, Saswata Chatterjee
informations.Plot: The emotional journey of two hopelessly in love youngsters, a young girl, Kizie, suffering from cancer, and a boy, Manny, who she meets at a support group.
